name: JoJo Siwa Dance
description:
Get ready for the biggest dance battle competition of the year and show the world which dancers rule!
Who will be the winners of the big show - ballerinas or hip hop dancers?
Help JoJo Siwa and show them what you got! Your dance skills will help JoJo Siwa to win the competition!

No matter the time or place, there have always been dance clubs.
A fascinating party through the ages!
"The party starts with the tap of your finger!"

Product Features:

- Choose you own character.
- Dance your way to win the bigger dance battle competition!
- Characters - 3D characters with unique style and dance moves
- Music - play to the rhythm of Jazz, Rock'n'Roll, Disco, Hiphop, and EDM


How to Play:

- Use interactive controls to play the JoJo Siwa game.
- Get the coolest or elegant outfits to win the dance competition!
